TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewRow extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow implements class System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public Class GridViewRow Inherits TableRow Implements IDataItemContainer
public ref class GridViewRow : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableRow, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer
type GridViewRow = class inherit TableRow interface IDataItemContainer interface INamingContainer

summary.span: 表示 控件中的单个行。

span.span: Represents an individual row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示中的单个行控件。The class is used represent an individual row in a control. 中的每一行控件具有指定的行类型使用枚举。Each row in the control has a designated row type using the enumeration. 下表列出了不同的行类型。The following table lists the different row types. |行类型Row type|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataRow`|中的数据行控件。A data row in the control.| |`EmptyDataRow`|中的空行控件。The empty row in the control. 显示空的行时控件具有没有记录可显示并模板不是`null`。The empty row is displayed when the control has no records to display and the template is not `null`.| |`Footer`|中的脚注行控件。The footer row in the control.| |`Header`|中的标题行控件。The header row in the control.| |`Pager`|中的页导航行控件。A pager row in the control.| |`Separator`|在一个分隔符行控件。A separator row in the control.| 若要确定的行类型对象，请使用属性。To determine the row type of a object, use the property. 一个对象也有与之关联的状态。A object also has a state associated with it. 状态可以是下表中的值的按位组合。The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table. |状态的值State value|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`Alternate`|对象是中的交替行控件。The object is an alternate row in the control.| |`Edit`|对象处于编辑模式。The object is in edit mode.| |`Normal`|对象是在其正常 （默认值） 状态。The object is in its normal (default) state.| |`Selected`|选择对象。The object is selected.| 若要确定的状态对象，请使用属性。To determine the state of a object, use the property. 控件将存储它的所有数据行中集合。The control stores all of its data rows in the collection. 若要确定的索引中的对象收集、 使用属性。To determine the index of a object in the collection, use the property. 您可以访问绑定到基础数据对象的属性对象使用属性。You can access the properties of the underlying data object that is bound to the object by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 属性均可用，仅在期间和之后事件的控件。The property is available only during and after the event of a control. 若要确定基础数据源中的数据对象的索引，请使用属性。To determine the index of the data object in the underlying data source, use the property. 您可以访问的各单元格对象使用属性。You can access the individual cells of the object by using the property. 如果单元格包含其他控件，则可以通过使用，从单元格中检索控件的单元格的集合。If a cell contains other controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the collection of the cell. 此外可以使用方法的单元格来查找该控件，如果控件具有指定。You can also use the method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an specified. 若要检索的字段值从字段列或使用自动生成的字段列的单元格的属性。To retrieve a field value from a field column or an automatically generated field column, use the property of the cell. 来检索其中的字段值绑定到控件的其他字段列类型的字段值，请首先从相应的单元格中检索控件，然后访问该控件的相应属性。To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 可以使用数据绑定表达式中直接字段列，而无需将值绑定到控件的属性。It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a field column without binding the value to a property of a control. 在这种情况下，字段值自动放置在控件。In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a control. 若要检索的字段值，必须先检索控制从相应的单元格中，然后使用其属性。To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then use its property. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象中的单元格从检索字段值控制，然后在页面上显示值。The following example demonstrates how to use a object to retrieve a field value from a cell in the control and then display the value on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRow/CS/gridviewrowcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRow/VB/gridviewrowvb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用对象来检索控件中声明字段列编辑项模板。The following example demonstrates how to use a object to retrieve a control declared in a field column's edit item template. 然后将文本框的值传递给用于更新数据源中的控件。The value of the text box is then passed to a control for updating in the data source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowFindControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowFindControl/CS/gridviewrowfindcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowFindControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowFindControl/VB/gridviewrowfindcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Script Exploits Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问到的基础数据对象的属性绑定对象。Use the property to access the properties of the underlying data object to which the object is bound. 期间和之后，属性才可用事件的控件。The property is only available during and after the event of a control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于数据行。This property applies only to data rows. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来检索字段值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve a field value. 然后使用的值是预先选择中的项行处于编辑模式时显示的控件。The value is then used to pre-select an item in a control displayed when a row is in edit mode. span.span: Gets the state of the object.
A bitwise combination of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定的状态对象。Use the property to determine the state of the object. 状态可以是下表中的值的按位组合：The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table: |状态值Status value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|对象是中的交替行控件。The object is an alternate row in the control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|对象处于编辑模式。The object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|对象是在其正常 （默认值） 状态。The object is in its normal (default) state.| |`DataControlRowState.Selected`|选择对象。The object is selected.| 此属性通常用于执行运算前确定行的状态。This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以确定一个行处于编辑模式还是处于选中状态。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a row is in edit mode or is selected. 如果用户选择不同的行时控件处于编辑模式，控件退出编辑模式。If the user selects a different row while the control is in edit mode, the control exits edit mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowState/CS/gridviewrowrowstatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowRowState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowState/VB/gridviewrowrowstatevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的行类型。

span.span: Gets the row type of the object.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定的类型行对象表示。Use the property to determine the type of row that the object represents. 下表列出了使用不同的行类型值枚举。The following table lists the different row type values using the enumeration. |行类型Row type|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||中的数据行控件。A data row in the control.| ||中的脚注行控件。The footer row in the control.| ||中的标题行控件。The header row in the control.| ||中的空行控件。The empty row in the control. 显示空的行时控件没有任何要显示的记录。The empty row is displayed when control does not have any records to display.| ||中的页导航行控件。A pager row in the control.| ||在一个分隔符行控件。A separator row in the control.| 此属性通常用于执行运算前确定行的类型。This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定要创建的行是否为脚注行。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether a row being created is a footer row. 如果行是脚注行，列的总和的值更新到的脚注行。If the row is a footer row, the value for the sum of the column is updated into the footer row. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowRowType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowType/CS/gridviewrowrowtypecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowRowType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowRowType/VB/gridviewrowrowtypevb.aspx#1)]
